name: Dummy Slicer
description:
This is a small game made by developer Qn2. In this game your goal is to

slice as much dummies as you can while trying to stay alive as they try to catch you.

This game currently offers two game modes: Normal mode and hardcore mode.

If you have any issues with the game please join our discord server and

ask for help there. This game will likely receive more updates in the future.
